articles.description: Raise your hand if you are tired of the car market. Even though used car prices are dropping, we still aren't paying less.
articles.content: Buying a used car has been particularly annoying over the last two years. Seeing prices for used models exceed the MSRP of a new model is enough to make any self-respecting person want to climb up th… [+3507 chars]
